welcome_message_body: Welcome to LaGrange, the charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic architecture, and delicious southern cuisine. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the wonders our city has to offer. Happy exploring!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Calloway Airport provides services for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Calloway Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Garden Harris County Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Garden Harris County Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
